thread.title: Today's radar hot spot: Ferguson Ave.
thread.title_full: Today's radar hot spot: Ferguson Ave. | savannahnow.com

author: Savannah Morning News
title: Today's radar hot spot: Ferguson Ave.
text:
By Savannah Morning News Savannah-Chatham Metropolitan Police will be operating radar hot spots along Ferguson Ave., today Oct. 26, 2015.
Police remind drivers there is zero tolerance for speeding in school zones.
